title: SetSessionConfigAspectMultiFragConfirm (Method)
text:
METHOD SetSessionConfigAspectMultiFragConfirm :
Error
Set optional outstation session configuration aspect - multi fragment confirmations.

rows.Name: multiFragConfirm
rows.Comment:
Specify whether application layer confirmations will be requested
for non-final fragments of a multi fragment response. Setting this to
FALSE would now be considered NON-COMPLIANT. Application layer
confirmations are always requested for responses that contain events.
